text: Caíque Luiz Santos da Purificação (born 31 July 1997), simply known as Caíque, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Ermis Aradippou. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Salvador, Bahia Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Esporte Clube Vitória players Category:Brazil under-20 international footballers
title: Caíque Luiz Santos da Purificação
